trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList.ItemDataBind"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representerar den metod som hanterar den <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList.ItemDataBind"> </xref> händelsen för en <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList"> </xref> kontroll.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Information om hur du utvecklar mobila ASP.NET-program finns i [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webbplats.

trans-unit.source: A list control contains a collection of items.
trans-unit.target: En listkontroll innehåller en samling objekt.

trans-unit.source: These items are of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem> class.
When providing default rendering, the list control represents a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem> by its <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: När du anger standardrendering kontroll lista representerar en <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>av dess <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text%2A>egenskap.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>

trans-unit.source: In templated rendering, the template can render any desired property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem> or associated data-bound object.
trans-unit.target: I mallbaserat återgivning mallen kan återge en önskad egenskap av en <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>eller motsvarande databundna objekt.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>

trans-unit.source: If an item is data-bound to a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem> object, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemDataBind> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Om ett objekt är databunden till en <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>objekt, den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemDataBind>händelsen utlöses.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemDataBind> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>

trans-unit.source: At this time, the handler can set properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem> object from arbitrary expressions.
trans-unit.target: Just nu, kan hanteraren ange egenskaper för den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>objekt från valfri uttryck.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListDataBindEventHandler> delegate for a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList> control, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: När du skapar en <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListDataBindEventHandler>Delegera för en <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList>kontroll, identifierar du den metod som hanterar händelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListDataBindEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList> control notifies the handler when an item event is generated.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList>kontroll meddelar hanteraren när en händelse för objektet har skapats.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList>

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Lägga till en instans av delegaten händelsen om du vill associera händelsen med din händelsehanterare.

trans-unit.source: Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Om du tar bort delegaten anropas händelsehanteraren när händelsen inträffar.
